response.overview: Fiction novelist, Henry Goodman's wife Aurore has just returned home after spending several months in a hospital for an unknown psychiatric condition that haunted her with nightmarish visions of the future. A condition the doctors say has since been "arrested." But as the couple begins to rebuild their marriage, Aurore's behavior grows increasingly strange until it eventually culminates with a violent collapse. As Henry seeks out alternative treatments, he encounters a mysterious Doctor who claims his unconventional remedies will heal her. This involves three intensive sessions. While each session sheds new light the nature on her condition, a terrifying truth is revealed that will change the couples entire understanding of reality, fantasy and time.
response.tagline: Allow yourself to feel the fear
response.title: The Three Sessions
